author: cframpton
msg: Fix up gumbo/core/DataGroup/viewport on Windows.  Add os specific pngs for gradient tests.  Some of the mac pngs had to be renamed to match the test name since the tests are DataGroup_ and the files were datagroup_ which on mac isn't the same thing.
